item.title:
RT by @shoucccc: â€œTrue partnerships thrive not only on shared goals but on a mutual belief in shaping a better future together.â€
Two years ago, at the annual SBC conference, I had the chance to meet @shoucccc and @liujeff by chance.
Chaofan is, without a doubt, one of the most fascinating developers Iâ€™ve ever metâ€”sharp, insightful, and always ready to share his opinions. Without hesitation, we @verilog_audit invested in Fuzzland, joining their team in pushing the boundaries of security innovation.
Congratulations to Chaofan and the @fuzzland_ team on completing the merge deal! Wishing you all the best in your collaboration with @solayer_labs, and Iâ€™m looking forward to seeing how this partnership brings us an even better user experience!
For me, the true meaning of investing isnâ€™t about returns or valuationsâ€”itâ€™s about the opportunity to walk alongside founders who are full of energy, capability, and vision. Itâ€™s about sharing their struggles, pain, and growth along the way. Iâ€™m incredibly grateful to have been part of this journey.
item.dc:creator: @mr_dddt
item.description:
â€œTrue partnerships thrive not only on shared goals but on a mutual belief in shaping a better future together.â€

Two years ago, at the annual SBC conference, I had the chance to meet @shoucccc and @liujeff by chance.

Chaofan is, without a doubt, one of the most fascinating developers Iâ€™ve ever metâ€”sharp, insightful, and always ready to share his opinions. Without hesitation, we @verilog_audit invested in Fuzzland, joining their team in pushing the boundaries of security innovation.

Congratulations to Chaofan and the @fuzzland_ team on completing the merge deal! Wishing you all the best in your collaboration with @solayer_labs, and Iâ€™m looking forward to seeing how this partnership brings us an even better user experience!

For me, the true meaning of investing isnâ€™t about returns or valuationsâ€”itâ€™s about the opportunity to walk alongside founders who are full of energy, capability, and vision. Itâ€™s about sharing their struggles, pain, and growth along the way. Iâ€™m incredibly grateful to have been part of this journey.

nitter.freedit.eu/shoucccc/status/1876362208311210327#m

item.title:
RT by @shoucccc: I guess folks are not happy with â€œ16B+ TPSâ€ claim. Here are some clarifications - itâ€™s used to show throughput.
16B+ *non-conflicting* transactions with correct pre-execution is around 700GB in our implementation and can be easily handled by sequencer in one second. Sequencer just needs to apply the effects via RDMA.
For conflicting transactions, TPS is much lower than that.
item.dc:creator: @shoucccc
item.description:
I guess folks are not happy with â€œ16B+ TPSâ€ claim. Here are some clarifications - itâ€™s used to show throughput.

16B+ *non-conflicting* transactions with correct pre-execution is around 700GB in our implementation and can be easily handled by sequencer in one second. Sequencer just needs to apply the effects via RDMA.

For conflicting transactions, TPS is much lower than that.
